page.title: 04Ecology
page.content: In ecological terms our area is one of contrast.On the one hand we have policies designed to retain the look of the area,on the other we have a certain amount of{pollution}from a number of large factories. Present{conservation}campaigns focus on landscaping spoil heaps,reducing the amount of litter and the dumping of waste into rivers. Most of the residential areas were made smokeless zones in the 1970's.However, factories still omit fumes into the air. Around Cawthorne and Haigh Wood there are many footpaths.These woods are teeming with{wildlife}such as red deer,badgers,grey squirrels and uncommon birds. Many areas are covered by woodland. The area lies in the foothills of the Pennines and we have a lot of rain and cool cloudy weather.
